{{Description|Box that contains Joyeux Vouchers. They have a unique flower-like shape and can only be found in the Veluriyam Mirage. They are also important collectibles for guests who wish to win rewards. Using the Flowing Joyspar and Felicitous Joyspar seems to allow one to more effectively find them...|[[Map]] description}}
'''Voucher Boxes''' are items found during the [[Secret Summer Paradise]] event around the [[Veluriyam Mirage]] map. When the player comes into contact with one, it will grant them {{Item|Joyeux Voucher|x=4}}.

When a Voucher Box is within close proximity of a player, an icon {{Icon|Voucher Box}} will appear on the [[Minimap]] along with a sound effect, similar to an [[Oculus]]. They are marked with the icon on the [[Map]] after using the [[Flowing Joyspar]] or [[Felicitous Joyspar]] Gadgets.
